values:

http://plastic-cigars.livejournal.com/23191.html

so im constantly dizzy, tired and having the worst migraine ever.
WHATS WRONG WITH ME?
http://plastic-cigars.livejournal.com/22843.html

im glad patricks finally back home.
so is my mom, now i dont sit at home and bug her all day long.
she wasnt use to me being at home so often.

i hate the wind and i hate school.

i cant wait for winter break though. three and a half more weeks and its here.
i want to go camping, but i think it might be too cold. maybe somewhere where its warm.
i really want to go to cabo, that would be fun.



im scared mustache is going to get blown over in this dumb wind.
http://plastic-cigars.livejournal.com/22712.html

you went to hawaii.
im miserable at home without you.
shopping and birthday presents didnt even make it better. 
which is extremely surprising.  

i desperately need a back rub, a kiss, or two. 
i need to cuddle.



i just need you to come home.
http://plastic-cigars.livejournal.com/22139.html

dont go to hawaii. i dont know if i can wake up knowing i wont be able to see you for 2 weeks. 
who am i going to pick up right after school? where am i going to eat 4 times a week?
where am i going to color pictures and who are they going to be of?
whos going to let me wear their flannel shirt when im freezing cold? 
and whos going to rub my back until i fall asleep?
whos going to give me back massages when i can barely move?

you make my life so much better, so much that i cant even function without you for two weeks.
i love you
http://plastic-cigars.livejournal.com/21941.html
I'm shaky, tired and alone. it seems like i'm always alone these days.
http://plastic-cigars.livejournal.com/21600.html

im really happy finally.
the only thing im not content with right now is my closet. i need to visit the new h&m real soon, and also miss sixty. i miss suhee.
http://plastic-cigars.livejournal.com/20816.html

it seems impossible to stay well ever since i started school again. im not sure if its mental or physical yet. either im sick or im just completely bored of my life, i want something new to happen, something to be excited about. im always complaining in my head, and i wish i could stop. i need to stop thinking and over analysing everything. i need something to keep me busy. i need a best friend.
http://plastic-cigars.livejournal.com/20546.html

i have one academic class on campus this year. so my day mostly consists of trying to sneak off campus or sitting in the quad. im starting to really enjoy photo, i can get away with anything, but trying to take beautiful pictures while at school is hard, elmo is so ugly and dull. art is way easy, just like last year. i still havent figured out how to sign in for my online english class, so now im thinking it might have been a bad idea to join. oh well. i barely have any homework this year, which is really nice. im just so bored. i cant wait for thanksgiving break so i can go somewhere and experience new things, atleast just for a week, and im thinking maybe solo?
http://plastic-cigars.livejournal.com/20283.html

Im in need of a new animal. something small and furry to come home to at night. something willing to listen when i havent socialized at school. something waiting for me on my bed ready to cuddle and nothing more.
http://plastic-cigars.livejournal.com/19991.html

why does my car suddenly break while im driving home on the 22 freeway
and of course im in garden grove alone and its 3 o'clock in the ####### morning and all i want to do is go home and sleep.
thank god for my brother being able to keep me calm enough to not break down and cry.
so i pull off the freeway and into some sketchy ass parking lot get out of my car with my BRAND NEW WHITE PANTS on and get on my knees and look under the car and then i realize theres part of my car dragging on the ground.
of course this doesnt happen to me earlier while im with all my friends, but im all alone.
i couldnt decide whether to rip it off, try and tape it back on or what.
after sitting in my car freaking out about the creepy men driving slowly staring at me sit in my car i get enough guts to get out again and kick under my car enough times until im finally satisfied.
i sped all the way home praying that i wouldnt get pulled over and practicing what i would say to the officer if i did.

i hate you mustache and 
i hate myself for ruining my only hours old white pants
http://plastic-cigars.livejournal.com/19731.html

I quit my job after only 2 months. I hate working, it's not for me. 
I still haven't finished my 405 point english project because I procrastinate way too much.
This weekend better be good, ok i know its going to be good. 
becuase this might have been the worst week of my life and it will probally continue to only get worse.


i wish it was my senior year. i have 2 friends at school now. lame. 

sorry for all the complaining, but i blame school for the hatin'
http://plastic-cigars.livejournal.com/19273.html

Today was a late start day.  I forgot about that until I pulled in the parking lot and no one was there except for the teachers.


I have my first "real" day of work today.
http://plastic-cigars.livejournal.com/19011.html
I love the rain. I'm glad I got to enjoy it at home today. I came home from school because I didn't have my rain boots on and how am I suppose to survive without them. EDIT:
http://plastic-cigars.livejournal.com/18688.html

He still makes me nervous, queasy maybe.
Its hard to speak around him.
I'm constantly wondering where I should look.

I want just that one sided smile.

I want his acknowledgement.
http://plastic-cigars.livejournal.com/18524.html
picture update soon. Starring LEAH LANGFORD.
http://plastic-cigars.livejournal.com/17968.html

I had a college interview today. It was so exciting to be talking about my life after high school.
I know I have two full years left, but I'm ready to be finished now.
I can officially apply in October and I hope that Margret wasn't just being nice when she says I'll of 
course be accepted. 

I love my friends, and I wish that high school wasn't starting in a week.

November 17th I will finally turn the big ONE SIX and be able to drive(I hope).

Im loving life right now. I just wish I had a significant other to share it wish.
http://plastic-cigars.livejournal.com/17783.html

This has been my favorite summer so far. EARLS THE BEACH ^my favorite picture ever, my favorite people ever. BEN, LEAH AND I. RED ROBINS AND ALARMS. BALLOON ANIMALS, A TOOTH AND FURRY ROLLER BLADES. THE END
http://plastic-cigars.livejournal.com/17613.html

I miss Alexis.
Registration is in a few hours and Im still awake.
School just reminds me of the times me and Alexis used to hang out.
Everyday as she walked to her car and i walked to my maids car we would smile.
Im going to miss that.
I miss everything about her. 
I love her.
http://plastic-cigars.livejournal.com/16570.html

I have a beach house starting today and i dont remember when it ends but sometime next weekend. 
And its really boring unless all my friends are there.
So please come and visit me.
We can go swimming or walk around the fun zone or have a bon fire.

Just call me, ill tell you where to park. Or you dont have to call me and you can just suprise me.
http://plastic-cigars.livejournal.com/16151.html

Recently I visited Palm Springs and Malibu. Palm Springs

We went to the movies played arcade games and saw The Island.
http://plastic-cigars.livejournal.com/15950.html

I love that you always answer "ok" when I invite you over
but, I hate that you never actually come over.

And I'm sorry for getting angry, but I can always tell when you're lying.
http://plastic-cigars.livejournal.com/15800.html

i miss...

liking a 7th grader when i was in 8th grade.

megatron and optimus prime

hanging out with mike everyday. at school, after school, and on the weekends.

laura. and that mest was our favorite band.

being chris' girlfriend.

ali, and going to joes cabin and snowboarding and seeing snow fall for the first time and then making snowmen drawing faces on them and putting them in the freezer for joes dad to find the next morning.
http://plastic-cigars.livejournal.com/15269.html
and why does OUR song come on everytime i pass by your house?
http://plastic-cigars.livejournal.com/14934.html

i just want to say

worst night ever.
http://plastic-cigars.livejournal.com/14494.html

I always think its going to be different the next time around.
I always thought we'd be the ones who ended up together.
People never change.


And I'm no different.
http://plastic-cigars.livejournal.com/14131.html

"Before we are able to move forward, we must first remember the past."

I miss us being inseparable.
http://plastic-cigars.livejournal.com/13996.html
I miss and love you Fee.
http://plastic-cigars.livejournal.com/12885.html

I'm still the same, but growing older has really torn us apart.

I still love silent car rides
and refuse to sleep at night.

but it still hurts you to see my life drastically change week to week.
http://plastic-cigars.livejournal.com/12658.html

its hard to be positive when everything surrounding you is negative.
and i wish i could say this meant nothing.
im working on it,
but theres days like today where everything matters.
http://plastic-cigars.livejournal.com/12314.html

there are some things i will never understand.


    


                i still like you
http://plastic-cigars.livejournal.com/11992.html

and I am some what happy about your decision,

in one day we had conquered so much.
nothing has ever changed between us.

I saw the look in your eyes. just as you saw it in mine.
thats when I knew it was true.

I'm not just another one of them.
http://plastic-cigars.livejournal.com/11279.html

I feel so lost with everyones feelings.
And why dont I have any of my own.

My past was once filled with all these feelings.
Lust, love, heartbreak.

I feel so numb to everything and everyone else.
I cant relate to anyones situtions right now,
even though Ive been in them a million times before.

I want my feelings back.
And I know you're the only one you can bring me down.
Together, I will crumble. 

"Please M, Take me far."
http://plastic-cigars.livejournal.com/11218.html

but you still eat your mom peanut butter sandwiches.
you like it creamy with no crusts.
http://plastic-cigars.livejournal.com/10557.html

http://plastic-cigars.livejournal.com/10015.html

I bought a kitty on Friday night, well actually Zack had to buy it for me, because he is almost 18. I named it Baby Z Igby Filley-Robins. Each name has a special meaning, well kinda. Baby Z because it's a baby, and the Z stands for Zack, since he bought it for me. Igby is what Jamie wanted to name it. Filley is the last name of the hottest guy in the entire world. And Robins is for Red Robins where the crew always eats, and where Jeff works.
http://plastic-cigars.livejournal.com/9390.html

She wants to be beautiful like the thin figures on the glossy pages in the book of conformity.
Helplessly placed in situations she struggles to find her way out.
And she loves everything about him.
Being with him makes her lonely. She can feel the warmth of his body and the love in his heart. 
She sees the kindness in his eyes and the grace in his movement.

All she wants to do is dance with him. His hands around her waist and her head on his chest.
http://plastic-cigars.livejournal.com/9047.html

Kiss me out of the bearded barley
Nightly, beside the green, green grass
Swing, swing, swing the spinning step
You wear those shoes and I will wear that dress

Oh, kiss me beneath the milky twilight
Lead me out on the moonlit floor
Lift up your open hand
Strike up the band and make the fireflies dance
Silver moon's sparkling
So kiss me

Kiss me down by the broken tree house
Swing me upon it's hanging tire
Bring, bring, bring your flowered hat
We'll take the trail marked on your father's map

Oh, kiss me beneath the milky twilight
Lead me out on the moonlit floor
Lift your open hand
Strike up the band and make the fireflies dance
Silver moon's sparkling
So kiss me
http://plastic-cigars.livejournal.com/8822.html
Why should I even pretend to be your friend.
http://plastic-cigars.livejournal.com/8522.html

I found her weakness.

What makes her hands shake. What makes her silent. What makes her almost cry. 
The sounds of his name and her smile is quickly put away.
The thought of him with someone else kills her.

She is heartbroken. 
Only if she could find this someone.
http://plastic-cigars.livejournal.com/8441.html

I'm not too sure about my maturity level, but I do know that I've grown to be more independent.
I am fine with staying home on Friday nights.
I like being home alone.
I'd like to think I understand why we all pretend everything is OK when in reality it's not, but I don't.
I don't understand why you lie to yourself and why you lie to everyone else, but mostly yourself. You dress yourself up as someone they expect you to be. You want to think that you live some hard life where you have to pretend. Everyone has secrets, but you hold the record for having the most.
I believe you let someone know the real you, and you didn't like that. You could not lie, but you would never take that back, because you loved them. You still do love them, but they don't love you. The more they learned the less they liked, they know the real you and thats why you love them and that's why they hate you more than they hate themselves.
http://plastic-cigars.livejournal.com/7744.html
The only person who truly wants to hang out with me is my mom.
http://plastic-cigars.livejournal.com/7615.html

It's going to be beautiful, I can see it. It's over the steepest hill, but we're almost there.
It would be beautiful, I can see it. This wouldn't be a problem, but she's weighing us down.
It should be beautiful, I can see it. If only I could show you.
http://plastic-cigars.livejournal.com/7328.html

I want you to believe things are good with me, even when they're not. I'd fake a smile, a laugh, just for you. I'll move a little closer and whisper into his ear. You wouldn't want me any other way.
You're standing in the middle and everyone's staring at you. You walk with your head held high, hands intertwined with hers, but you're not happy. You're taking big steps and she can't keep up. YOU'RE FAKING A SMILE. YOU'RE FAKING YOUR FEELINGS. My feelings are real, even if its hate. But it's really love.
http://plastic-cigars.livejournal.com/7051.html

Rian left today. I spent time with him yesterday at Disneyland and this morning at Earls. I met Rian on Valentines day.
Last night I was finishing up writing my page to him for his memory book, and I just started crying, I tried to go to sleep last night, but I just layed there thinking about him and all the wonderful times we spent together and I cried. I eventually cried myself to sleep around 4AM and then woke up around 5AM to go to his goodbye breakfast. As soon as I got in Jamie's car and watched Rian drive the other way I was completely saddened. 
I think this might be really hard for me. I've never lost someone close to me, not even a real pet. I've only had one friend move away, and she only lives 20 minutes away and I see her often and talk to her everyday.
Disneyland won't be the same, there won't be anymore cigarette breaks and I'll even miss that. Getting 4AM phone calls from you asking me why I'm asleep will be missed. I'll miss you picking me up and going to the most random places we can think of, but always having so much fun.
I love Rian and miss him already.
http://plastic-cigars.livejournal.com/6860.html
I want to go to a new school.
http://plastic-cigars.livejournal.com/6464.html

it sucks when it is the last night of summer and you're sitting home.
Rian wants to go to Dland tomorrow, I want to go just me and him, no one else. I want to be his ride partner again.

I don't get along with very many people anymore.
I keep too many of my thoughts inside, I have thousands of secrets. I have thousands of secrets to tell absolutely no one.
http://plastic-cigars.livejournal.com/6158.html

everything has become much too personal. i want to mention names. i want to actually say how i really feel with out covering up things so that people who could understand wouldnt. and that is why, i quit.
http://plastic-cigars.livejournal.com/6042.html

It feels like we have been drifting apart. Our dislikes are what keeps us together. We thrive on other peoples mistakes and flaws. 
I stood back and watched most of the times, behind everyone in silence. I heard and figured her out. "Shes a girl." Thats no excuse. She turns her back and won't look me in the eyes except when she wants to prove me wrong. It's something so simple to grasp, she wants me to fight back. She would fight back, but I won't. "Maybe that's not her intention." I know it is, she has shown me how she does it, right before her best friends eyes. 




can anyone tell me what she's fighting for?
http://plastic-cigars.livejournal.com/5704.html
If only I had the guts to feel this way
http://plastic-cigars.livejournal.com/5428.html
